title: PBE
body: The link for when I sign up for the PBE doesn't work, whenever I click it, it says error 500 we are working on a fix. Can I still sign up for the PBE somewhere else? Or do I have to wait?

replies.body:
This often happens if there are issues somewhere along your route to the server. Try using a [VPN](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virtual_private_network) such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [CyberGhost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) to bypass the error.

Let me know if either one of those worked for you!
